contextId.information: AT: "You can see flowers" or "People can see flowers." (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])

AT: "that have bases of pure gold as their foundation." His feet are valuable and precious like bases of pure gold that support the pillars of marble. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]] and [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_metaphor]])
contextId.quote: set on bases of pure gold

contextId.information: The beautiful flowers make the pile of wheat seem even more beautiful. AT: "that has lilies all around it." (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])
"people would completely despise him" or "people would harshly ridicule him" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_activepassive]])
contextId.quote: the offer would utterly be despised
